trends: There have been no other sightings in Vaslui
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting Details The shooting took place in the night of 30th June 2013.Anca waas sleeping at home. Even though the ships seem to be red and they were flashing, in reality their light was very bright and stable. At first these ships were standing. Then, they started to move slowly in groups of 3 to 4 or maybe more while the others remained in place. They didn't make any sound. I saw clearly one of the ship which went above my building (i don't know exactly at what distance was the ship, but it was enough to see clearly the ship's shape). It was ovoid and had a light color.
Summary: I was sleeping. I noticed lights inside my room. I thought they were stars.
